Class StringUtils

public inherited sharing class StringUtils

Utility class for handling string operations

Change History

08/17/2024 Initial version.
08/26/2024 getBlankValue(): Gets the default value if the input value is blank.
08/30/2024 isValidEmail(), isNotValidEmail(): Validate an email address.

Methods

public static String getBlankValue(
  String inputValue,
  String defaultValue
)

Gets the default value if the input value is blank.

Parameters:
    inputValue – String: The input value.
    defaultValue – String: The default value.

Returns:
    String: The input value if not blank, otherwise the default value.

public static String getNextChar(String ch)

Gets the next character in the alphabet or digit sequence.

Parameters:
    ch – String: The input character.

Returns:
    String: The next character in the alphabet or digit sequence.

public static Boolean isNotValidEmail(String email)

Validates an email address.

Parameters:
    email – String: The email address to validate.

Returns:
    Boolean: Returns true if the email address is not valid, otherwise false.

public static Boolean isValidEmail(String email)

Validates an email address.

Parameters:
    email – String: The email address to validate.

Returns:
    Boolean: Returns true if the email address is valid, otherwise false.
